features: POWERFUL AIR CIRCULATION FOR EVENLY BROWNED FOOD WITH LITTLE TO NO OIL: The Sure-Crisp air fry convection function circulates air around food as it cooks, creating crispy and delicious fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables and more.

AIR FRYER OVEN COMBO WITH 4 VERSATILE COOKING OPTIONS: You get the convenience and deliciousness of crispy air frying along with all the classic toaster oven functions you love: toasting, baking and broiling.

4 SLICE CAPACITY PROVIDES PLENTY OF COOKING SPACE: This toaster oven with air fryer has room for everything you cook, from 4 slices of toast to a 9" pizza, a 3 lb. chicken in an 8" x 8" pan or a 9" x 5" loaf pan.
INCLUDES METAL AIR-FRY BASKET, BAKE PAN AND BROIL RACK. The air fryer oven comes with all the accessories you need to air fry, bake, broil, and toast, plus a slide-out crumb tray.
EXCELLENT COOKING AND TOASTING PERFORMANCE: Quality heating elements provide precise, accurate temperatures from 200° to 450°F and even cooking without hot spots.
body.description: The Hamilton Beach® Sure-Crisp™ Air Fryer Toaster Oven creates evenly browned, crispy foods with Sure-Crisp air frying functionality. The 4 versatile settings let you air fry, toast, bake or broil a wide variety of food and it has a 4 slice capacity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Even crisping and browning of an air fryer right on your countertop Using little to no oil, the Sure-Crisp function turns fresh or frozen French fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables and more into crispy deliciousness that you and your family will love.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach 1100W Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven Powerful air circulation for evenly browned food with little to no oil The Hamilton Beach Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven combines Sure-Crisp air frying functionality with the versatility of a classic toaster oven. It's easy to use — just add food to the mesh basket without overcrowding it, slide it into the oven and place the bake pan underneath. As a toaster oven, it fits 4 slices of toast, a 9" pizza, an 8" x 8" pan or a 9" x 5" loaf pan. Two rack positions let you adjust or remove the racks as needed. Powerful air circulation for evenly browned food with little to no oil 4 versatile cooking options for air frying, baking, broiling and toasting 4 slice capacity provides plenty of cooking space Includes metal basket for air frying, bake pan, broil rack and slide-out crumb tray Powerful, fast cooking with 1500 watts

Features: Powerful Air Circulation for Evenly Browned Food with Little to No Oil The Sure-Crisp air fry convection function circulates air around food as it cooks, creating crispy and delicious fries, chicken wings, steaks, fish, vegetables and more. 4 Versatile Cooking Options You get the convenience and deliciousness of crispy air frying along with all the classic toaster oven functions you love: toasting, baking and broiling. 4 Slice Capacity Provides Plenty of Cooking Space This toaster oven has room for everything you cook, from 4 slices of toast to a 9" pizza, a 3 lb. chicken in an 8" x 8" pan or a 9" x 5" loaf pan.

Includes Metal Basket for Air Frying, Bake Pan and Broil Rack The oven comes with all the accessories you need to air fry, bake, broil, and toast, plus a slide-out crumb tray. The basket fits on the upper oven rack with the bake pan below to catch drippings. Excellent Cooking and Toasting Performance Quality heating elements provide precise, accurate temperatures from 200° to 450°F and even cooking without hot spots. With 1100 Watts, you'll have all the cooking power you need for everything from crispy air frying to toasting, baking and broiling. Patented Controls Contoured knobs are easy to turn. The 30-minute timer with ready bell and automatic shutoff provides peace of mind and the stay-on setting makes it easy to extend cooking time when needed. The stylish stainless steel exterior gives your kitchen the sleek, modern appearance you love and easily matches your other appliances.

4-Slice Easy Reach Toaster Oven Sure-Crisp Air Fryer Countertop Toaster Oven Air Fryer Countertop Toaster Oven with Quantum Technology Hamilton Beach Professional Sure-Crisp Air Fry Digital Countertop Toaster Oven Sure Crisp Air Fryer Toaster Oven & Electric Grill Combo Size 4-Slice 4-Slice 6-Slice 6-Slice 6-Slice Air Fry ✓ Quantum Convection Technology ✓ ✓ Wattage 1200 1120 1400 1500 1700 Other Easy Reach Door Indoor Searing Grill Capability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for everything
reviews.reviewText: Makes great toast, Bakes well and works great as a fryer—-excellent buy and nice looking . Takes up same place as last toaster oven

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little powerhouse
reviews.reviewText: Love this little guy! An easy to use, easy to clean, toaster oven with a small footprint on my counter. The appliance heats up very quickly and the fan is rather quiet when using the air fryer mode. Love the included accessories (fry basket, baking tray) as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very small and lightweight.
reviews.reviewText: The materials are very flimsy but it works.The interior of the oven is tiny only good for one person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toaster/air fryer combo
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my office as my toaster oven broke. It works great. The only negative i can give this is the amazon driver left it on the back steps to my receiving dept (in the actual box, exposing what is inside). And it was raining out. The product didn't get wet but i thought that was irresponsible of the driver to leave it out in the rain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the small size as it's for my office. It's fairly expensive so I expected little to no flaws. Didn't notice at first because I was so excited to finally receive it after waiting a week and a half for delivery, I was sent the wrong product. Waiting another week and a half for the correct one, I immediately opened it to run it and get the new appliance smell out. Which didn't go away after about a dozen uses. What I was really upset about was the metal rack, it's so crooked that when its in the door doesn't close all the way. The box is so big and I already went thru the hassle of waiting three weeks for this thing it's not even worth it to exchange at this point.Pros: it's easy to use. Fits in small spaces and heats quickly.Cons: cooks very unevenly. Rack is mis shaped so the door won't close right. The racks and trays sit too high so things burn easily if you don't flip food quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with my air fryer. I use it almost daily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great Looking Appliance But Disappoints
reviews.reviewText: This HB all purpose toaster/oven provides the perception of a total solution. While it looks good on your counter and appears to be well-constructed, this unit tends to disappoint. Most notably, the "air fryer" option.I placed (evenly) about 8 frozen mozzarella sticks in the provided basket. Moved dial to "air fryer", dial to maximum heat and rotated dial to left in order for the oven to stay on. The air fryer cooked unevenly: some sticks were getting burned while others were barely beyond frozen. After multiple actions such as re-positioning and taking out the overly cooked sticks, I realized that before I could achieve a crispy result, the sticks would be burned instead. I was left with a tasteless, rubbery and a very unsatisfying result.The HB toaster/over gets even lower marks for simple toasting. It is recommended to use the top option and keep the rack close to the top. OK -- the top surface can achieve a nice browning (don't walk away, keep observing), but underneath, the bread is still well-below finished. Of course, you can take the bread out and flip over the pieces but is that what you might say efficient and expected?You might ask what did I expect from an inexpensive appliance like this one? Well, maybe the idea of having an air fryer to do small portions to a satisfying crispiness is alot to expect. Scratch that option. But, at the bare minimum, bread that toasts evenly to a desired "brownness" is not too much to ask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We had a Air Fryer and a Toaster oven on our kitchen counters. This replaced both. Air Fryer part takes a little loger on this unit than the one we had.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sirve más como horno que como freidora
reviews.reviewText: Fácil de usar pero no rinde como freidora de aire
